Additional reserves: 422 Mt at >5% P2O5; 278 Mt at >10% TiO2, 10 Mt at >10% vermiculite (Carvalho and Bressan, 2005). Diamond-bearing kimberlite pipes are located 20 km SE (Vaaldiam Res., 2008).</comments><mineral role="ore">anatase</mineral><mineral role="ore">ancylite</mineral><mineral
